abstract: Higher oil and gas prices helped Europe’s two biggest oil companies to beat analysts’ expectations.
snippet: Higher oil and gas prices helped Europe’s two biggest oil companies to beat analysts’ expectations.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  Higher oil and gas prices helped Royal Dutch Shell and BP report record first-quarter profits on Tuesday, beating analysts’ expectations and prompting a rise in stock prices across the industry.

headline.main: Shell and BP Report Record First-Quarter Profits
